SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.github.bjarneh.utilz
Class log

java.lang.Object
  com.github.bjarneh.utilz.log

public class log
extends Object

Simple logger, that logs to System.err by default, but can log to any PrintStream, or multiple streams. 


  // Typical use:

  log.error("something is wrong");
  log.debug("just debuggin...");
  log.info("formatting a number to log: %d\n", 10);

setLevel

public static void setLevel(int logLevel)
Set the log-level for this logger. Value must be one of DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, FATAL.

Parameters:
logLevel - set the log-level for the logger

addStream

public static void addStream(PrintStream dest)
Add destination stream without removing current streams.

Parameters:
dest - add a destination stream for logger, don't remove others.

debug

public static void debug(String msg)
Write message to log for DEBUG and higher priority.

Parameters:
msg - is the message that will be written to the log

debug

public static void debug(String fmt,
                         Object... args)
Write a formatted message log for DEBUG and higher priority. Formatting is done in PrintStream.printf(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) format.

Parameters:
fmt - is format string
args - are the arguments for the format string
